title: Does Donald Trump have Kleinfelter's syndrome?
subtitle: Based on the "YXX" mark on his selective service record, the Internet theory is that Donald Trump is suffering from Klinfelter syndrome - a genetic condition in which the male is born with extra chromosome X.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The "YXX" sign on Donald Trump's selective service record indicates that he suffers from the genetic condition of Kleinfelter's syndrome.
